update HZ_MBOM_REOCRD_BEFORE_CHANGE
P_MBOM_STATUS = 2,
P_SPARE_PART = #{sparePart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_SPARE_PART_NUM = #{sparePartNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_PROCESS_ROUTE = #{processRoute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_LABOR_HOUR = #{laborHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_RHYTHM = #{rhythm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_SOLDER_JOINT = #{solderJoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MACHINE_MATERITAL = #{machineMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_STANDARD_PART = #{standardPart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_TOOLS = #{tools,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_WASTER_PRODUCT = #{wasterProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CHANGE = #{change,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CHANGE_NUM = #{changeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_BOM_TYPE = #{pBomType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
P_STOCK_LOCATION = #{pStockLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_FACTORY_ID = #{pFactoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where P_BOM_LINE_ID = #{lineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and P_BOM_DIGIFAX_ID = #{bomDigifaxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (P_MBOM_STATUS <> 5 and P_MBOM_STATUS <> 6)

P_MBOM_STATUS = 2,

update ${tableName}
P_SPARE_PART = #{sparePart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_SPARE_PART_NUM = #{sparePartNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_PROCESS_ROUTE = #{processRoute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

P_SOLDER_JOINT = #{solderJoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

and PUID = #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update.foreach:
update ${item.tableName}
P_UPDATE_TIME =sysdate,
P_UPDATE_NAME = #{item.updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_PARENT_UID = #{item.parentUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_BOM_LINE_IS_HAS = #{item.isHas,jdbcType=INTEGER},
P_BOM_LINE_ID = #{item.lineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_BOM_LINE_IS_2Y = #{item.is2Y,jdbcType=INTEGER},
P_BOM_LINE_IS_PART = #{item.isPart,jdbcType=INTEGER},
P_BOM_LINE_IS_DEPT = #{item.isDept,jdbcType=INTEGER},
P_BOM_OF_WHICH_DEPT = #{item.pBomOfWhichDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_BOM_LINE_PART_NAME = #{item.pBomLinePartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_BOM_LINE_PART_CLASS = #{item.pBomLinePartClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_BOM_LINE_PART_EN_NAME = #{item.pBomLinePartEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

P_STOCK_LOCATION = #{item.pStockLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_FACTORY_ID = #{item.pFactoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

P_REVISION = #{item.revision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where P_BOM_LINE_ID = #{item.lineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and P_BOM_DIGIFAX_ID=#{item.bomDigifaxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and P_MBOM_STATUS <> 0

mapper.select: select t2.OBJECT_NAME, t2.OBJECT_DESC,t3.p_cfg0_model_record from HZ_BOM_LINE_RECORD t7 left join HZ_CFG0_OF_BOMLINE_RECORD t5 on t5.p_bomlinepuid=t7.puid left join Hz_Cfg0_Record t6 on t6.puid=t5.p_to_cfg0_id_of_bl left join HZ_CFG0_TO_MODEL_RECORD t3 on t3.p_cfg0_id_record=t6.puid left join Hz_Cfg0_Model_Record t2 on t2.puid=t3.p_cfg0_model_record left join HZ_CFG0_MAIN_RECORD t4 on t4.puid=t2.p_cfg0_model_of_main_record where t4.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t1.P_SORT_NUM from HZ_MBOM_RECORD t1 where t1.P_BOM_DIGIFAX_ID =( select t2.puid from Hz_Bom_Main_Record t2 where t2.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )order by CAST(t1.P_SORT_NUM as FLOAT) DESC)WHERE rownum = 1

select * from (select t.*,ROWNUM as rn from (select
from HZ_MBOM_RECORD t1 where t1.P_BOM_DIGIFAX_ID =( select t2.puid from Hz_Bom_Main_Record t2 where t2.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and P_BOM_LINE_IS_2Y=1 and t1.P_MBOM_STATUS <> 0)t WHERE ROWNUM <=#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}) where rn >#{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from HZ_MBOM_RECORD t1 where t1.P_BOM_DIGIFAX_ID =( select t2.puid from Hz_Bom_Main_Record t2 where t2.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and P_BOM_LINE_IS_2Y=1 and t1.P_MBOM_STATUS <> 0

SELECT count(*) from HZ_MBOM_RECORD t1 where t1.p_bom_digifax_id=( select t3.puid from Hz_Bom_Main_Record t3 where t3.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=( select t2.puid from Hz_project_libs t2
t2.puid=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) and( t1.P_UPDATE_TIME BETWEEN (SYSDATE-7) and (sysdate) )and t1.P_MBOM_STATUS = 0

select max(TO_NUMBER((substr(P_LINE_INDEX,instr(P_LINE_INDEX,'.',0),instr(P_LINE_INDEX,'.',1)-1)))) m from HZ_MBOM_RECORD t where t.p_bom_digifax_id=( select t3.puid from Hz_Bom_Main_Record t3 where t3.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=( select t2.puid from Hz_project_libs t2
t2.puid = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) and LENGTH(TRANSLATE(P_LINE_INDEX,',0123456789','.'))=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P_SORT_NUM FROM HZ_MBOM_RECORD where p_bom_digifax_id=( select t3.puid from Hz_Bom_Main_Record t3 where t3.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=( select t2.puid from Hz_project_libs t2
t2.puid=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
and P_MBOM_STATUS <> 0 and CAST(P_SORT_NUM as FLOAT) >#{sortNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ORDER BY CAST(P_SORT_NUM as FLOAT))WHERE rownum =1

SELECT * FROM ${tableName} where p_bom_digifax_id=( select t3.puid from Hz_Bom_Main_Record t3 where t3.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=( select t2.puid from Hz_project_libs t2
t2.puid=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
and P_MBOM_STATUS <> 0

update.foreach:
update ${tableName}
P_UPDATE_TIME =sysdate,
P_UPDATE_NAME = #{item.updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_PARENT_UID = #{item.parentUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_BOM_DIGIFAX_ID = #{item.bomDigifaxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

P_BOM_LINE_IS_2Y = #{item.is2Y,jdbcType=INTEGER},
P_BOM_LINE_IS_PART = #{item.isPart,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where PUID = #{item.puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

t2.puid=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
